subject: Chemistry
q: How many moles of water are produced when 2 moles of hydrogen gas react completely with oxygen? (2H2 + O2 → 2H2O)
exp: Reaction stoichiometry: 2H2 + O2 → 2H2O. 2 moles H2 produce 2 moles H2O, so 2 moles H2 produce 2 moles H2O.
